data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
With reference to above cited subject, please take note that the meeting of our Company's Board of Directors (the 'Board') was held today, Tuesday, 8th November, 2022 has considered and approved:
1. The Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 and Limited Review Report thereon issued by the Statutory Auditor.
